name: OnPlayerExitVehicle
warnings:
Not called if the player falls off a bike or is removed from a vehicle by other means such as using SetPlayerPos.
You must use OnPlayerStateChange and check if their old state is PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER or PLAYER_STATE_PASSENGER and their new state is PLAYER_STATE_ONFOOT.
description: This callback is called when a player starts to exit a vehicle.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that is exiting a vehicle.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle the player is exiting.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_fn:
RemovePlayerFromVehicle: Throw a player out of their vehicle.
 GetPlayerVehicleSeat: Check what seat a player is in.
related_cb:
OnPlayerEnterVehicle: Called when a player starts to enter a vehicle.
 OnPlayerStateChange: Called when a player changes state.
 RemovePlayerFromVehicle: Throw a player out of their vehicle.
 GetPlayerVehicleSeat: Check what seat a player is in.
